title: 64. Discounts, Favors, Trust Issues + Raising Your Prices... Business Lessons I've Learned the Hard Way.
description:
Hi Roomies!!

I'm back with a solo ep sharing some of the biggest lessons I've learned over the first year as a business owner. We talk:

- anxiety

- raising your prices

- trust issues

- confidence

- favors

- setting the same rules for everyone

- discounts

- "training" your clients

and more!!!

Have a topic request or question for a future episode? Comment on my latest @myestytessa.

MY SOCIAL MEDIA + SHOPS

You can shop my Glymed store here 

or DM me on Instagram to purchase IS Clinical + Jan Marini.

Tess' Instagram @myestytessa

Tess' YouTube: Tess Zolly 

Tess' TikTok: @myestytessa
